#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
int main()
 {
 	int t;
 	cin >> t;
 	while(t--) {
 		vector<ll int> h;
 		ll int n , kk, m;
 		cin>> m;
 		n=m;
 		while(m--) {
 			cin>> kk;
 			h.push_back(kk);
 		//	cout << " s = " << kk << endl;
 		}
 		
        ll int ans = 0, maxx =0;
        ll int a[n];
        ll int b[n];
        for(ll int i = 0; i < n ; i++) {
            maxx = max(maxx,h[i]);
            a[i]= maxx;
           // cout << maxx << endl;
        }
        maxx=0;
        for(ll int i = n-1; i >=0; i--){
            maxx = max(maxx, h[i]);
            b[i] = maxx;
        }
        ll int lm = 0;
        for(ll int i = 0; i < n; i++)  ans = ans+max(min(a[i],b[i])-h[i], lm);
        cout<< ans << endl;
 	}
      return 0;
}
